author: daniellehrner
content: We have problems with part of our Hoodi validators. One of the cloud instance where we run them somehow disappeared overnight and half of our validators with it. The problem is purely a devops issue, not a problem with Besu itself. For Hoodi we use a new cloud provider and are still in the process of setting up everything, so it might take a bit until we can get those validators up again.
